# hickuphh3

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Independent Security Researcher

## Highlights

  * [Ranked #20 on Code4rena all-time leaderboard](https://code4rena.com/leaderboard)

As of June 2023, I'm currently ranked #20 on the Code4rena all-time
leaderboard, with $140k+ in awards.

  * [ETHTaipei Security Panel](https://code4rena.com/leaderboard)

In April 2023, I participated in a live panel at ETHTaipei on all things web3
security alongside representatives from Code4rena, Quantstamp, Trail of Bits,
and more.

  * [Hosted community workshop on Clober](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9sbUCjfM6P4)

As part of my work with Spearbit, I hosted a community workshop that looked at
a security assessment of Clober DEX.

## hickuphh3's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

\- Small codebases preferred (~2, max 3k sLOC) with assurance of other audit
engagements \- Preference for defi (DEXes, derivatives, NFT lending etc.)

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-
audit#warden=hickuphh3&source=hickuphh3-profile)

## About

Hi! I'm an independent security researcher since mid 2021, with smart contract
experience since 2018. Lived through crypto winter and 2020 defi summer.
Always curious, never ceasing in trying out new tooling & cutting edge-
platforms

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/HickupH)
